name: Snapping Turtle Style
text: Your deft unarmed style allows you to shield your body from harm.
prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +1 or monk level 1st.
benefit: While using the Snapping Turtle Style feat with at least one hand free, you gain a +1 shield bonus to AC.
staminaText: When using this style, as long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool, your shield bonus to AC increases by 1.
text_zh: 你高超的徒手战斗技巧给予你保护。
prerequisites_zh: 精通徒手击打，BAB+1或武僧1级。
benefit_zh: 当你处于鳄龟流派架势时，如果至少有一只手空闲，你在AC上得到+1盾牌加值。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个流派时，只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，AC上的盾牌加值就能提升1点。
